timeline.message: Only create observations when openmrs entity is a concept or is empty

timeline.body:
I think this should be returned as
`entity = option.optString(OPENMRS_ENTITY,checkboxEntity);`

This is because options can have `OPENMRS_ENTITY` i.e concepts defined in the options
timeline.bodyHTML:
I think this should be returned as
entity = option.optString(OPENMRS_ENTITY,checkboxEntity);

This is because options can have OPENMRS_ENTITY i.e concepts defined in the options
timeline.author: githengi

timeline.body: Doesn't this assume that the `openmrs_entity` has to be type concept? It could be empty, right?
timeline.bodyText: Doesn't this assume that the openmrs_entity has to be type concept? It could be empty, right?
timeline.bodyHTML: Doesn't this assume that the openmrs_entity has to be type concept? It could be empty, right?
timeline.author: vincent-karuri

timeline.body: Not sure why this needs to be moved to the top. I think each checkbox option can define what its `openmrs_entity` is - which can be different from the parent.
timeline.bodyText: Not sure why this needs to be moved to the top. I think each checkbox option can define what its openmrs_entity is - which can be different from the parent.
